title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A modern, fully responsive e-commerce website with shopping cart functionality, product filtering, and a seamless checkout experience. Built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS for optimal performance.

title: Task Management App
description: An intuitive task management application featuring drag-and-drop kanban boards, real-time updates, and collaborative team features. Designed for productivity and ease of use.

title: Restaurant Website
description: A beautiful, mobile-first restaurant website with online menu, reservation system, and gallery showcase. Features smooth animations and an elegant design that captures the dining experience.
